entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
